sn22.100:4.3: No first point is found of sentient beings roaming and transmigrating, hindered by ignorance and fettered by craving.
sn22.100:4.4: Suppose a dog on a leash was tethered to a strong post or pillar.
sn22.100:4.5: When walking it walks right beside that post or pillar.
sn22.100:4.8: lying down, it lies down right beside that post or pillar.
sn22.100:4.9: In the same way, an uneducated ordinary person regards form like this: ‘This is mine, I am this, this is my self.’
sn22.100:4.13: consciousness like this: ‘This is mine, I am this, this is my self.’
sn22.100:4.14: When walking, they walk right beside the five grasping aggregates.
sn22.100:4.17: lying down, they lie down right beside the five grasping bundles.
sn22.100:4.18: So you should regularly check your own mind:
sn22.100:4.19: ‘For a long time this mind has been corrupted by greed, hate, and delusion.’
sn22.100:4.20: Sentient beings are corrupted because the mind is corrupted.
sn22.100:4.21: Sentient beings are purified because the mind is purified.
